caption.title: Bayes factor (BF) test for significant non-zero rates in Avian influenza A-H5N1.
caption.p: Only rates supported by a BF greater than 3 are indicated. The color and thickness of the line represent the relative strength by which the rates are supported; thin white lines and thick red lines suggest relatively weak and strong support respectively. The maps are based on satellite pictures made available in Google Earth ( http://earth.google.com).
